title: 权限组权限啊
author: Exploding_Chick
txt_content:
我想使VIP玩家可以打彩色字体，但是权限给了后不好使，怎么办？
我给的权限是
    - essentials.nick
    - essentials.nick.color
    - essentials.nick.format
    - essentials.nick.magic

    - essentials.msg
    - essentials.msg.color
    - essentials.msg.format

replies.author: xRPQx
replies.txt_content:
彩色
essentials.chat.color

粗体
essentials.chat.format

replies.author: xiao_zan
